chapterTitle: Financial Statements, Taxes, and Cash Flow

columns.text: This exercise requires us to compute for the Retained Earnings of Griffin’s Goat Farm, Inc.

Let's first define the Retained Earnings.

**Retained Earnings** are the cumulative net profits of a corporation after accounting for dividends payable.

Retained Earnings is computed as follows: 

$$ \begin{aligned}
\text{Retained Earnings} &= \text{Net Income} - {\text{Dividends}}\\[1pt]
\end{aligned}$$

Now before we compute for the Retained Earnings, let's first compute for the Income Statement using the information in problem 2.


| Particulars | Amounts ($) | 
|--|--:| 
| Sales|796,000 | 
| Cost|327,000 | 
| Depreciation Expense |42,000 | 
| Interest Expense|34,000 |

Net Income is computed as follows: 

$$ \begin{aligned}
\text{Net Income} &= \text{Sales} - {\text{Expense}}\\[1pt]
\end{aligned}$$

As presented below,  after deducting all the expenses which comprise the cost of sales, depreciation, and interest expense, the net income will be as follows:
$$\def\arraystretch{1.2} 
\begin{array}{|c|} \hline
 \textbf{Griffin's Goat Farm, Inc.}\\
 \text{Income Statement}\\ 
\text{For the year ended December 31, 20XX}\\ 
\hline \begin{array}{l r r }\\ 
\text{Sales} & \$796,000 &\\ 
\text{Less: Cost of Goods Sold} & \underline{327,000} & \\ 
\textbf{Gross Profit} & \$469,000\\ \text{Less: Depreciation} & \underline{\quad42,000} &\\ 
\textbf{Earnings before interest and taxes} & \$427,000\\ 
\text{Less: Interest Expense} & \underline{34,000}\\ 
\textbf{Taxable income} & \$393,000\\ \text{Less: Income Tax Expense} & \underline{82,530}\\ 
\textbf{Net Income} & \underline{\underline{\mathbf{\$310,470}}}\\ \end{array}\\\\ \hline 
\end{array}$$

Now that we have computed the Net Income, let's now compute for the retained earning using the equation in step 3.

$$ \begin{aligned}
\text{Retained Earnings} &= \text{Net Income} - {\text{Dividends}}\\[5pt]
&= \text{\$310,470} - {\text{95,000}}\\[5pt]
&= \boxed{\textbf{\$215,470}}
\end{aligned}$$

Therefore, the retained earnings of Griffin’s Goat Farm, Inc. is **$215,470**.
